mapper.select: WITH week_start AS ( SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(NOW()) - 2) DAY) AS this_week_monday ) SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = this_week_monday THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS mon, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tue, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 2 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wed, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 3 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS thu, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 4 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fri, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 5 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sat, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 6 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sun FROM ( SELECT res_date FROM TBL_END_RES UNION ALL SELECT res_date FROM TBL_RESERVATION ) combined_res, week_start WHERE DATE(res_date) BETWEEN this_week_monday AND DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 6 DAY);

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE RES_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_END_RES WHERE RES_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) as total_reservations;
select count(*) AS 'MONTH', sum(case when QR_CONFIRM = 0 then 1 else 0 end) AS 'NOSHOW' from TBL_END_RES where date_format(res_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m');

SELECT a.RES_NO, a.RES_DATE, b.USER_ID, c.STORE_NAME, a.RES_TIME, a.QR_CONFIRM, 'Y' AS isToday FROM TBL_RESERVATION a LEFT JOIN TBL_USER b ON a.USER_NO = b.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_STORE c ON a.STORE_NO = c.STORE_NO

a.QR_CONFIRM IS NULL

a.RES_DATE = #{word}

CONCAT(IFNULL(a.RES_NO, ''), ' ', IFNULL(a.RES_DATE, ''), ' ', IFNULL(b.USER_ID, ''), ' ', IFNULL(c.STORE_NAME, ''), ' ', IFNULL(a.RES_TIME, ''), ' ', IFNULL(a.QR_CONFIRM, '')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%')

SELECT USER_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN QR_CONFIRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'TOTAL_RES', SUM(CASE WHEN IS_RANDOM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'TOTAL_RANDOM' FROM TBL_END_RES GROUP BY USER_NO ORDER BY USER_NO;

SELECT a.RES_NO, a.RES_DATE, a.USER_NO, b.USER_ID, a.STORE_NO, c.STORE_NAME, a.RES_TIME, a.QR_CONFIRM, a.QR FROM TBL_RESERVATION a LEFT JOIN TBL_USER b ON a.USER_NO = b.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_STORE c ON a.STORE_NO = c.STORE_NO WHERE RES_NO = #{resNo}
